compliant.section: 7.1 從我們收到閣下的個人資料時刻起，我們將根據適用法律的要求採取所有合理可行的步驟和安全措施，以確保閣下的個人資料安全存儲並受到我們和我們的數據處理者的保護，以防止未經授權的訪問、處理、刪除，丟失或使用。
compliant.legal provisions: Appropriate technical and organizational measures shall be taken to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk, including protection against unauthorized or unlawful processing and against accidental loss, destruction or damage, using appropriate technical and organizational protection measures such as pseudonymization, encryption or other methods to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, availability and resilience of processing systems and services.

compliant.section: 7.2 除本私隱條例中規定的目的和用途外，我們將保密且安全地保存閣下的個人資料，並且僅基於充分必要性的基礎上進行披露。
compliant.legal provisions: Personal data shall be processed lawfully, fairly and transparently in relation to the data subject ('lawfulness, fairness and transparency').

compliant.section: 7.3 如果我們將閣下的個人資料外包和委託給數據處理者，我們將使用合同和其他方式來監控數據處理者對本私隱條例的遵守。
compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall be responsible for and be able to demonstrate compliance with this Regulation.
